name: poshly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves places and things that are expensive and of high quality: The food was quite simple, but it was presented poshly. Louise gave me some poshly packaged artisan chocolates.
in a way that is typical of people from a high social class : He spoke very loudly and very poshly. She poshly refers to her evening meal as "supper".
More examplesFewer examplesThe flats have been poshly renovated.The poster was poshly printed using decorative fonts and high-quality paper.He had been poshly educated at a leading private school.
